chat_history.message:
Hello,

My product iPhone 13 has the above problem:

According to tracking, it was delivered to me but I was on vacation and didn't receive any package, nor did I sign anything.

Thank you very much for your help,

Hi there,

The recipient of this order claims they haven't received it, even though the tracking shows up as delivered. 

We have asked the customer to look for their package in case it was delivered to a neighbor or family member. If they can't find the package, we asked them to provide the Certificate of Non-receipt and their ID, ---- ONLY IF THE ORDER IS AN IPHONE 12/13/14 (to remove) --- along with a proof of address.

Dear Backcare,

Kindly assist the customer in preparing a handwritten CND with the IMEI of the device and their ID. We will check with our logistics partner. In the meantime, kindly do not refund the customer, thank you for your understanding and cooperation.

Regards,
YR

Dear Backcare,

Attached is the POD.

Regards,
KJ

Dear ecomobile,

The customer contacted us by e-mail to say that he had received the parcel from a neighbour, so this case can be closed.

Thanks for your help in keeping our shared customers happy!

Have a nice day.

Best regards,
Astrid Back Market customer Care

Dear Backcare, 

Looks like the issue has been resolved. Kindly close the case if no further assistance is required. 

Thank you

Regards,
CH
